mapper.select: SELECT ut.id, ut.ticket_id, pr.name, pr.`price`, u.name as username, e.title, c.name as city, tt.`name` AS ticketType, v.`name` AS venue, i.`url`, p.`duration`, p.`start_time`, ut.status, ut.create_time FROM user_ticket ut JOIN ticket t ON t.`id` = ut.`ticket_id` JOIN ticket_type tt ON tt.`id` = t.`ticket_type_id` JOIN price pr ON tt.`price_id` = pr.`id` JOIN performances p ON p.`id` = t.`performance_id` JOIN EVENTS e ON e.`id` = p.`event_id` JOIN venues v ON v.`id` = p.`venue_id` JOIN city c ON c.`id` = v.`city_id` JOIN images i ON i.event_id = p.event_id join user u on u.id = ut.user_id where ut.user_id = #{userId} and ut.is_deleted = 0 and t.is_deleted = 0 and tt.is_deleted = 0 and pr.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0 and e.is_deleted = 0 and v.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and i.is_deleted = 0 and u.is_deleted = 0 order by ut.create_time desc
